https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tH51iteHZdHshOB2e6lph5q7Wfw.jpg Marooned on a remote peninsula and haunted by frightening specters, a young man must confront the grotesque denizens of the night, or heed the Lighthouse Keeper's cryptic warning to, 'Always keep a light burning!'
